author: DocF87

changelog.release_notes:
new:
- all colors are configurable
- alternative font faces to choose
- more display options to choose for displaying battery state and date
- indicator when battery is loading
- option for vibration on full hour
- if phone is without internet connection old data is displayed (a dot under the watch indicates that old weather data is displayed)

fixes/optimizations:
- weather update should be more reliable
- weather icons smaller
- various other fixes
- adding option to show battery level as number instead of image

description:
Classic watchface for Pebble Time offering additional information (complications):
- battery indicator of the watch battery
- date
- current temperature
- current weather condition

Settings:
- all colors
- font
- seconds hand visible/hide/hide at defined time
- weather information via autolocation or for fixed location
- interval of weather updates
- vibrate on bluetooth disconnect
- vibrate on full hour
- display options for date and battery

The dot under the watch dial indicates, that the last weather update was unsuccessful due to missing internet connection on your phone. Old weather information is displayed but updated at next update-interval (or earlier if you switch to the timeline or menu). The dot will vanish if updated weather information is displayed again.

Weather information provided by Yahoo Weather.
Please note that displaying the seconds handle reduces battery life because the screen has to update every second.
title: Analog
